WORK_DOMAIN: Information Systems in Agronomy, Environment, Fishery & Marine Sciences
WORK_BACKGROUND: Graduated Engineer in Agronomic Sciences from the French National Polytechnical Institute (INP-ENSAT), with a Master degree in Environment & Natural Resources management, i developed my work experience building Geographic Information Systems applied to Agronomy, Environment, Fisheries & Marine Sciences.
WORK_CURRENT: I am currently working as Consultant in Information Systems in these fields of application, and acting as International Consultant for the FAO of the United Nations - Fisheries and Aquaculture Department.
